cause.description:
GLOBAL YOUTH FUND is the world's first democratic charity.
Created by youth for youth, it engages young people around the world in a democratic bottom-up process to choose their own global campaigns.
Members then organize activities in their communities to create awareness and raise funds for their chosen campaigns.
Global Youth Fund is a registered charity in Canada and a project sponsored by the Creative Visions Foundation 501(c)3 in the U.S.
Its current programs include:
1) Ideas Bank - an online database of the best solutions for our planet, the best ideas for change.
2) This I Believe Essay Project - Youth share with one another life-changing moments that helped define or shape a core belief they have.
Please visit www.globalyouthfund.org
1. Youth are leaders now.
2. Charities can be democratic.
3. By working together, we can be stronger and wiser.
cause.mission: Support youth in working together to create positive change around the world.
cause.name: Democratic Charity for Youth
